REUTERS.UNKNOWN: RM f0505 reute u f BC-K-O-P-EQUITY-WARRANT 03-31 0100

TEXT.TITLE: K-O-P EQUITY WARRANT BOND EXPECTED TO BE SWAPPED
TEXT.BODY: The proceeds from yesterday's 100 mln dlr equity warrant for Kansallis-Osake-Pankki (K-O-P) will probably be swapped into floating rate dollars once the final terms have been set for the deal, executive vice-president Erkki Karmila told a press conference. The seven-year issue has an indicated coupon of 4-1/8 to 4-5/8 pct and is priced at par. Final terms will be set on April 7. Karmila said that in the short term K-O-P did not need additional capital funds but the issue "gives us access to attractive funds." REUTER
